items.title: A review process exists for Trump’s White House ballroom. He hasn’t applied yet.
items.description: The National Capital Planning Commission has taken years to approve much smaller White House projects than a ballroom planned by President Trump.

items.title: Redistricting battle underscores an age of partisan divisiveness
items.description: The corrosive forces that brought the nation’s politics to this point long predated Donald Trump.

items.title: Democrats eyeing 2028 aim to show they’re unafraid of enemy turf
items.description: Some presidential prospects have embraced “Sister Souljah moments” that demonstrate their independence from left-wing orthodoxy.
